donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The project has two main components:
(i) Pro poor policy development and monitoring:-  this component will facilitate development and implementation of pro poor policies and strategies at national, sectoral and decentralized level within the framework of national systems and processes for planning, budgeting, monitoring and reporting that engage all stakeholders. Focus areas will include promoting strategies for pro poor growth; strengthening analysis, monitoring and communicatin; enhancing effective participation by non state actors; evidence based decision making and multi stakeholder dialogue processes that promote equitable growth and reduced inequalities.

(2) Wealth creation:- compliment natinal efforts to accelerate growth and create employment by empowering the poor and vulnerable groups to participate in and benefit from emerging opportunities, United Nations Development Program will work with Government institutions at national and decentralized levels to dreate enabling business environment and enhance the competitiveness of SMEs by building organizational and technical capacities. The deepening the United Nations Development Program support to business development and efforts of achieving of Millennium Development Goals through strengthening public-linkages is essential to improve the country's business environment and reduction of poverty.

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH

project_title: Pro-Poor Policy Development and Wealth Creation
